parameters.n: A numeric vector: the number of treated animals within a two-week period.
parameters.y: A numeric vector: the number of deaths at the end of the two weeks.

description:
Description
Hypothetical drug trial to compare the effect of four antibiotics against Shipping fever in calves 
(Shoukri and Pause, 1999, Table 3.11).
title: Antibiotics against Shipping Fever in Calves
format: A data frame with 24 observations on the following 3 variables.
